title: Himi 20
lyrics:
7’s
1.
‘Oku fiemālie
‘A ia ‘oku ‘ilo
Hono malōlō’anga
‘I he nima ‘o Sīsū.
2.
Ko hono tauhi ia
Pea mafai ‘e ia,
Ke fa’a poupou hake
‘A hono laumālie.
3.
‘Oku ne tokanga’i
‘A ‘ene kakai tui,
Pea fa’a malu’i
‘A honau laumālie.
4.
Ko ia na’e ‘ilo
‘A e sipi ‘alu hē;
Ko Sīsū anga’ofa
Ko hotau tauhi ia.
5.
Ke pehē ‘eku tui
Ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū
Pea u piki ma’u ai pē
Ki hoku unga’anga.
6.
Pea u ma’u hoku tu’unga
Ki ho nima to’omata’u,
‘I he ‘aho fakamui,
Mo ho’o fanga sipi. *
